page.title: 13SIGNIFICANT DEVELOPMENTS(1)
page.content: A questionnaire was sent out.People were asked "What do you think are the most important recent happenings for the locality?"600 replies were recieved.It was felt that the most significant developments have been-1.The building of the high security jail(Frankland)and the remand centre at Low Newton.Large numbers of prison officers had moved into the area.2.The building and occupying of Newton Hall estate.3.The improvement of shopping facilities in the local area and Durham City.4.The lack of leisure amenities.5.The extensive house rehabilitation scheme in Pity Me and Framwellgate Moor.6.The sale of council houses to tenants. It was felt by some people that the appointment of the controversial Bishop, Richard Jenkins, had ensured that the area could not be forgotten.
